item.title: Chrome Handy Shortcuts
item.description: Chrome Handy Shortcuts copy from console use copy(“AABB”) to copy AABB to clipboard Similarly if you need to copy an object from console, select the object and right click and set it as global variable after that object will move to a new variable temp1, then run copy(temp1) to copy it to clipboard.
